code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import API from'../api';import'../Styles.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await API.post('login/',{username,password});localStorage.setItem('token',response.data.token);localStorage.setItem('role',response.data.role);navigate('/');}catch(error){alert("Login failed");console.error(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Welcome Back!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Please log in to continue"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Username:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-green",children:"Log In"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{marginTop:'1rem'},children:"Don\u2019t have an account?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/register",className:"btn btn-pink",children:"Register Here"})]});}export default Login;
